overview_of_class:
This course is designed to give students an understanding of core mathematical concepts commonly used in college courses. Students will be introduced to the fundamentals of mathematical modeling, solving equations, manipulative mathematics expressions and other quantitative problem solving skills. The course does not count for credit if taken after any higher mathematics course.

This course is conducted completely online. A technology fee will be added to tuition.
name: Algebra
title: SCS MATH 101-DL-12 Algebra
